name: EveningMeditation
0:
”Alexa, start Evening Meditation”
”Alexa, play Evening Meditation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evening meditation
des:
With this amazing skill, you can now get relaxed anywhere. Just ask Alexa to start Evening Meditation and leave everything else to Alexa. Relax your mind and body during this background calming instrumental composition. Use it for Zen meditation, Reiki, Yoga, spa, sleep, massage and study in background.

No matter in which situation you're, this skill will help you get relaxed. Evening Meditation has 3 hours of audio which will help you get relaxed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
